Pet-Friendly Fitness Tracker: A dog leash that doubles as a fitness tracker, tracking the owner's steps, distance traveled, and calories burned while walking their furry friend. This innovative leash not only provides a fun and interactive way for owners to exercise with their dogs but also helps them monitor their own fitness goals. Confidence Score: 0.8

Smart Leash with Built-In GPS: A dog leash that comes equipped with a built-in GPS tracker, allowing owners to locate their dog in real-time, even when they are not in sight. This feature provides peace of mind for owners who worry about their dog's safety while exploring new areas. Confidence Score: 0.9

Customizable Leash Length: A dog leash that allows owners to adjust the length of the leash to suit their dog's size and energy level. This feature ensures that the leash is always comfortable and secure for both the owner and the dog, providing a more enjoyable walking experience. Confidence Score: 0.8

Automatic Leash Retractor: A dog leash that features an automatic retractable mechanism, allowing the leash to wind back in when the dog is walking and release when the owner is ready to stop. This innovative design eliminates the need for owners to constantly hold onto the leash, providing a more hands-free experience. Confidence Score: 0.9

Leash with Built-In Water Bottle: A dog leash that comes equipped with a built-in water bottle, providing owners with a convenient and easy way to stay hydrated while walking their dog. This feature is especially useful for owners who enjoy long walks with their furry friend. Confidence Score: 0.8
